english.segment1: He's in a city not too far away. And many go to see him. Confess! Confess, my people cry. But they do not see the still frame in my mind
english.segment2: And I know, I know He loves me still. And I know, I know he loves me. But I can see the controversy. I can see the controversy
english.segment3: I can see the controversy! I can see it in this. I can see the controversy! I can see it in this
english.segment4: And I will decrease so you can increase
english.segment5: Yeah, let's get this started. I've got a message inside me. And I cannot withhold it. I plead and cry, these people die. And they still do not see the spear in his side
english.segment6: I would wish that you could see me. in this controversy
